name: Robohexar
tagline: I am a IntelliJ Plugin that pre-reviews your code before it goes before the Hexar for judgment.  I have been activated. Missing punctuation and grammar will be punished.
body:
![Young Hexar](http://www.gradmail.com/gradmail/images/hexar%20a.jpg)
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/RoboPlugins/RoboHexar.svg?branch=ci)](https://travis-ci.org/RoboPlugins/RoboHexar)

# Installation
From within an Idea IDE, choose:

1. Settings.
1. Plugins.
1. Browse Repositories.
1. Search for "Robo Hexar".
1. Profit.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
